issue.title: Model for left arm is wrong in v4 (and has always been wrong)

content.raw:
Ok, @tkoolen 's urdf looks much better than the one I had posted in branch `issue_492_v5`. I've merged his changes for atlas_v5_simple_shapes.urdf into branch `issue_492_v5_twan` in 2a9511871e52.

It sounds like there are still some issues with the hand mounting, so I will hold off on making a pull request.
content.html:
Ok, @tkoolen 's urdf looks much better than the one I had posted in branch issue_492_v5. I've merged his changes for atlas_v5_simple_shapes.urdf into branch issue_492_v5_twan in 2a9511871e52.
